intro: Cover the LDR to imitate darkeness

steps: 1. Place the LED on the breadboard
2. Place a 220ohm resistor on the breadboard
3. Connect a jumper wire between the resistor and positive side of the LED
4. Connect a jumper wire from D2 to the resistor

build.steps: Place the LDR and the resistor on the breadboard
Connect a jumper wire from AO to the resistor

steps: 1. Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
2. Connect a jumper wire from the negative of the LDR
3. Connect a jumper wire from the negative to the LDR
